sentences.en: Their ire was directed mainly at the government.
sentences.cn: 他们的愤怒主要针对该政府。

sentences.en: Her ire slid between us like the spanner from Father's workshop, straining our hinge.
sentences.cn: 她的怒气像父亲作坊里的扳手一样夹在我们中间，绷紧了我们的铰链。

sentences.en: That of course raised my ire.
sentences.cn: 这当然也引起我的忿怒。
